mapper.select: SELECT A.MENU_ID, A.MENU_MAIN_TITLE, A.MENU_SUB_TITLE, C.IAT_ID, C.MENU_MENU_ID, C.IAT_FULL_SUPPLY, C.IAT_ONE_SUPPLY, C.IAT_WEIGHT, C.IAT_KCAL, C.IAT_SUGARS, C.IAT_PROTEIN, C.IAT_SATURATED_FAT, C.IAT_NATRIUM FROM MENU A JOIN IAT C ON (A.MENU_ID = C.MENU_MENU_ID)

SELECT A.MENU_ID, A.MENU_MAIN_TITLE, A.MENU_SUB_TITLE, C.IAT_ID, C.MENU_MENU_ID, C.IAT_FULL_SUPPLY, C.IAT_ONE_SUPPLY, C.IAT_WEIGHT, C.IAT_KCAL, C.IAT_SUGARS, C.IAT_PROTEIN, C.IAT_SATURATED_FAT, C.IAT_NATRIUM FROM MENU A JOIN IAT C ON (A.MENU_ID = C.MENU_MENU_ID) WHERE MENU_MAIN_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')

SELECT A.MENU_ID, A.MENU_MAIN_TITLE, A.MENU_SUB_TITLE, A.MENU_CONTENT, A.MENU_PRICE, B.MENU_IMAGE_NAME, B.MENU_IMAGE_EXTENTION, B.MENU_IMAGE_ROUTE FROM MENU A INNER JOIN MENU_IMAGE B ON (A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_MENU_ID) WHERE A.MENU_NEW=1;

SELECT A.MENU_ID, A.MENU_MAIN_TITLE, A.MENU_SUB_TITLE, A.MENU_CONTENT, A.MENU_PRICE, B.MENU_IMAGE_NAME, B.MENU_IMAGE_EXTENTION, B.MENU_IMAGE_ROUTE FROM MENU A INNER JOIN MENU_IMAGE B ON (A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_MENU_ID) WHERE A.MENU_TYPE=1;

SELECT A.MENU_ID, A.MENU_MAIN_TITLE, A.MENU_SUB_TITLE, A.MENU_CONTENT, A.MENU_PRICE, B.MENU_IMAGE_NAME, B.MENU_IMAGE_EXTENTION, B.MENU_IMAGE_ROUTE FROM MENU A INNER JOIN MENU_IMAGE B ON (A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_MENU_ID) WHERE A.MENU_TYPE=2;

SELECT A.MENU_ID, A.MENU_MAIN_TITLE, A.MENU_SUB_TITLE, A.MENU_CONTENT, A.MENU_PRICE, B.MENU_IMAGE_NAME, B.MENU_IMAGE_EXTENTION, B.MENU_IMAGE_ROUTE FROM MENU A INNER JOIN MENU_IMAGE B ON (A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_MENU_ID) WHERE A.MENU_TYPE=3;

SELECT A.MENU_ID, A.MENU_MAIN_TITLE, A.MENU_SUB_TITLE, A.MENU_CONTENT, A.MENU_PRICE, B.MENU_IMAGE_NAME, B.MENU_IMAGE_EXTENTION, B.MENU_IMAGE_ROUTE FROM MENU A INNER JOIN MENU_IMAGE B ON (A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_MENU_ID) WHERE A.MENU_TYPE=4;

SELECT A.MENU_ID, A.MENU_MAIN_TITLE, A.MENU_SUB_TITLE, A.MENU_CONTENT, A.MENU_PRICE, B.MENU_IMAGE_NAME, B.MENU_IMAGE_EXTENTION, B.MENU_IMAGE_ROUTE, C.IAT_ID, C.MENU_MENU_ID, C.IAT_FULL_SUPPLY, C.IAT_ONE_SUPPLY, C.IAT_WEIGHT, C.IAT_KCAL, C.IAT_SUGARS, C.IAT_PROTEIN, C.IAT_SATURATED_FAT, C.IAT_NATRIUM FROM MENU A INNER JOIN MENU_IMAGE B ON (A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_MENU_ID) INNER JOIN IAT C ON (A.MENU_ID = C.MENU_MENU_ID) WHERE A.MENU_ID=${menuId};

SELECT A.MENU_ID, A.MENU_MAIN_TITLE, A.MENU_SUB_TITLE, A.MENU_CONTENT, A.MENU_PRICE, B.MENU_IMAGE_NAME, B.MENU_IMAGE_EXTENTION, B.MENU_IMAGE_ROUTE, C.IAT_ID, C.MENU_MENU_ID, C.IAT_FULL_SUPPLY, C.IAT_ONE_SUPPLY, C.IAT_WEIGHT, C.IAT_KCAL, C.IAT_SUGARS, C.IAT_PROTEIN, C.IAT_SATURATED_FAT, C.IAT_NATRIUM FROM MENU A INNER JOIN MENU_IMAGE B ON (A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_MENU_ID) INNER JOIN IAT C ON (A.MENU_ID = C.MENU_MENU_ID) WHERE A.MENU_ID=${menuId};
